Class BankAccountRegistrationController

public without sharing class BankAccountRegistrationController

Description: Apex controller for VF page BankAccountRegistration. Registers a new recipient within Mercury bank. References:

Changes

08/09/2021 Initial version. 08/09/2021 Uses custom metadata for default values. Uses own address if present. 08/13/2021 Sets record type for bank accounts. 08/25/2021 If error registering bank account, we will still display the confirmation page to the customer and we'll follow up internally to see what's it about.
